Class Inventory.PartnerInventory

The inventory for Mario's Partners. This tells which Partners Mario currently has available.

GetAllPartners()

Returns all Partners in the party. If none are in the party, an empty array is returned.

Declaration

Returns
Type Description
BattlePartner[]

An array of BattlePartners in the party. An empty array if no BattlePartners exist in the party.
